titleStmt.title: Description of Tosafot on the tractate Ḥulin.

notesStmt.note: Last few leaves slightly damaged. Imperfect at the end.

Censored by Domenico Irosolimitano, Italian censor (active in the last quarter of the 16th and first quarter of the 17th century): inscribed with his name, 1592 (folio 106r); see 61, and appendix § 62-74. Folios 2r and 106v contain doodles.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msItem.title: Tosafot masekhet Ḥulin תוספות מסכת חולין

collation.p: Quires of mostly 8 leaves each, marked with a catchword on the last page.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: French Ashkenazi semi-cursive of the 14th century.

binding.p: BM/BL in-house. Spine title: 'Tosaphoth Chullin. Hebrew. Brit. Mus. Additional 27,295.'

history.provenance: Acquisition: Samuel Schönblum: purchased from him by the British Museum on 4 April 1866: inscribed, folio fse002v [108v].
